trans-unit.resname: PS15·23 | Kytheon, Hero of Akros | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kytheon, Hero of Akros
trans-unit.target: Kytheon, Hero of Akros

trans-unit.resname: PS15·23 | Kytheon, Hero of Akros | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At end of combat, if Kytheon, Hero of Akros and at least two other creatures attacked this combat, exile Kytheon, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control. {2}{W}: Kytheon gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: At end of combat, if Kytheon, Hero of Akros and at least two other creatures attacked this combat, exile Kytheon, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control. {2}{W}: Kytheon gains indestructible until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PS15·23 | Gideon, Battle-Forged | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gideon, Battle-Forged
trans-unit.target: Gideon, Battle-Forged

trans-unit.resname: PS15·23 | Gideon, Battle-Forged | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Up to one target creature an opponent controls attacks Gideon, Battle-Forged during its controller's next turn if able. [+1]: Until your next turn, target creature gains indestructible. Untap that creature. [0]: Until end of turn, Gideon, Battle-Forged becomes a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
trans-unit.target: [+2]: Up to one target creature an opponent controls attacks Gideon, Battle-Forged during its controller's next turn if able. trans-unit.resname: PS15·60 | Jace, Vryn's Prodigy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jace, Vryn's Prodigy
trans-unit.target: Jace, Vryn's Prodigy

trans-unit.resname: PS15·60 | Jace, Vryn's Prodigy | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are five or more cards in your graveyard, exile Jace, Vryn's Prodigy, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are five or more cards in your graveyard, exile Jace, Vryn's Prodigy, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.

trans-unit.resname: PS15·60 | Jace, Telepath Unbound | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jace, Telepath Unbound
trans-unit.target: Jace, Telepath Unbound

trans-unit.resname: PS15·60 | Jace, Telepath Unbound | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Up to one target creature gets -2/-0 until your next turn. [−3]: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. [−9]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, target opponent mills five cards."

trans-unit.resname: PS15·106 | Liliana, Heretical Healer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana, Heretical Healer
trans-unit.target: Liliana, Heretical Healer

trans-unit.resname: PS15·106 | Liliana, Heretical Healer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Lifelink Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile Liliana, Heretical Healer, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: Lifelink Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile Liliana, Heretical Healer, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

trans-unit.target: Liliana, Defiant Necromancer

trans-unit.resname: PS15·106 | Liliana, Defiant Necromancer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Each player discards a card. [−X]: Return target nonlegendary creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield. [−8]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."

trans-unit.resname: PS15·135 | Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh
trans-unit.target: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh

trans-unit.resname: PS15·135 | Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a red spell, untap Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh. {T}: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast a red spell, untap Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh. {T}: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

trans-unit.resname: PS15·135 | Chandra, Roaring Flame | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chandra, Roaring Flame
trans-unit.target: Chandra, Roaring Flame

trans-unit.resname: PS15·135 | Chandra, Roaring Flame | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. [−2]: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target creature. [−7]: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you."
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. [−2]: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target creature. [−7]: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you."

trans-unit.resname: PS15·189 | Nissa, Vastwood Seer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nissa, Vastwood Seer
trans-unit.target: Nissa, Vastwood Seer

trans-unit.resname: PS15·189 | Nissa, Vastwood Seer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Nissa, Vastwood Seer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, exile Nissa, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.
trans-unit.target: When Nissa, Vastwood Seer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, exile Nissa, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

trans-unit.resname: PS15·189 | Nissa, Sage Animist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nissa, Sage Animist
trans-unit.target: Nissa, Sage Animist

trans-unit.resname: PS15·189 | Nissa, Sage Animist | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand. [−2]: Create Ashaya, the Awoken World, a legendary 4/4 green Elemental creature token. [−7]: Untap up to six target lands. They become 6/6 Elemental creatures. They're still lands.
